definitions.definition: Pertaining to the asp or aspen tree.
Of a woman's tongue: wagging, gossiping.
The asp tree; a kind of poplar tree (genus Populus sect. Populus). A medium-size tree with thin, straight trunks of a greenish-white color.
definitions.example: Above a certain elevation, the aspens gave way to scrubby, gnarled pines.

definitions.definition: The wood of such a tree; usually pale, lightweight and soft.
definitions.example: She claimed that aspen was the only "proper" material from which make a wicker basket.
